title: Right, uh. Bugsplat every time I try to load in.
body:
Basically what the title says, but also, it keeps bugsplatting every game I try to reconnect in. I'm not sure what's the problem, and I even tried deleting the game.cfg, and that didn't help at all. Any solutions to this problem??? {{item:3070}}

Oh, right. This is on the Alpha Client. I haven't tried the Legacy Client yet, but I'm doing that right now. I'll edit this when I get the results back.

Edit: Legacy Client (not launcher) isn't popping up. _greattttt_
Maybe I'll try to do a full repair. I'll update on this later.

replies.body:
Did you just change to a new monitor over the Holiday? If so, I know *exactly* what's causing this. If not, then this is probably caused by a common driver or hardware problem that should be resolved after working through our [**Bugsplat Guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)

Let me know if you have any further issues.

nah, it isn't a new monitor. it's actually an old laptop that's been working for years (still on windows 7, hah) which league DOES work on it, until like, a couple of days ago. i can only suspect it's something i downloaded. when i cleaned my laptop of any virus with an anti-virus software, it's still doing the same thing. i don't know why, ;;

Gotcha, in that case, I'd like you to work through the Bugsplat Guide I linked, as this is likely caused by a driver or hardware issue that should be fixed after taking those steps.

Let me know if this caused any change!

Try completely reinstalling the game, i had same problem and even couldn't open the client, ended up switching back to the old client and still using it
